text: Pen nɨbi binɨb wog gɨñeb okok, bɨawl nɨbi okok takaw kɨli ak mɨdupsek nɨg dɨl kɨdek gɨnɨmɨb.3.22-25 Epe 6.5-8 Kɨli nɨg yelaknɨŋ, won anɨb ak nep wog gɨtep gon kɨlop tep gaŋ agɨl, anɨb ma gɨnɨmɨb. Bɨawl Klays nop pɨlɨkɨl, bɨawl nɨbi okok kɨlop yepɨs gɨl wog yokɨp ma gɨnɨmɨb, wog kɨles gɨl gɨtep yɨbɨl gun agɨl gos nɨgɨnɨmɨb.
